metadata.title: CVE-2020-28052 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Legion of the Bouncy Castle BC Java 1.65 and1.66. The OpenBSDBCrypt.checkPassword utility method compared incorrectdata when checking the password, allowing incorrect passwords to indicatethey were matching with previously hashed ones that were different.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
